source.title: Subagents - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Custom subagents via `.claude/agents/` Markdown files: YAML frontmatter (`name`, `description`, `tools`, `model`, `permissionMode`, `skills`), `/agents` command, built-in agents (general-purpose, plan, explore), `--agents` CLI flag, chaining, resumable `agentId` sessions.

source.title: Plugins - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Plugin creation with `.claude-plugin/plugin.json` manifest: `commands/`, `agents/`, `skills/`, `hooks/` directories, `.mcp.json`, `.lsp.json` configuration, `--plugin-dir` testing, namespaced slash commands (`/plugin-name:command`), migration from standalone `.claude/` configuration.

source.title: Agent Skills - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Model-invoked `SKILL.md` files with YAML frontmatter (`name`, `description`, `allowed-tools`, `model`): personal `~/.claude/skills/`, project `.claude/skills/`, plugin distribution, progressive disclosure with reference files, subagent `skills` field integration, troubleshooting discovery and conflicts.

source.title: Skill authoring best practices - Claude Docs
source.description: Skill authoring best practices: conciseness, gerund naming, third-person descriptions, progressive disclosure patterns, workflow checklists, feedback loops, bundled utility scripts, template and examples patterns, evaluation-driven development, MCP tool references (`ServerName:tool_name`), anti-patterns.

source.title: Output Styles - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Output styles modifying system prompt: built-in styles (`default`, `explanatory`, `learning` with `TODO(human)`), custom Markdown files in `~/.claude/output-styles/` or `.claude/output-styles/`, `keep-coding-instructions` frontmatter, `/output-style` command, comparisons to `CLAUDE.md` and agents.

source.title: Get started with Claude Code hooks - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Hooks quickstart: `/hooks` command, `PreToolUse`/`PostToolUse` matchers, `jq` command logging, `prettier`/`gofmt` auto-formatting, markdown language detection, `notify-send` desktop alerts, file protection blocking `.env`/`.git` paths, security considerations.

source.title: Headless mode - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Agent SDK CLI mode with `-p`/`--print` flag for non-interactive execution. `--output-format` (text, json, stream-json), `--json-schema` structured output, `--allowedTools` auto-approval, `--continue`/`--resume` session continuation, `--append-system-prompt` customisation.

source.title: Plugin marketplaces - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Creating and distributing plugin marketplaces: `marketplace.json` schema, `/plugin marketplace add` commands, plugin sources (GitHub, Git URL, local), `strict` mode, `extraKnownMarketplaces`, `strictKnownMarketplaces` enterprise restrictions, and troubleshooting.

source.title: Plugins reference - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Plugin technical reference: component types (commands, agents, skills, hooks, MCP/LSP servers), `plugin.json` manifest, `${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}` variable, installation scopes, CLI commands, caching, directory layout, and debugging.

source.title: Slash commands - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Built-in slash commands, custom command creation in `.claude/commands/`, `$ARGUMENTS`/`$1` placeholders, bash execution with `!` prefix, frontmatter (`allowed-tools`, `model`), plugin and MCP commands, `SlashCommand` tool, and Skills comparison.

source.title: Use Claude Code with Chrome (beta) - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Chrome browser integration via Claude in Chrome extension: `--chrome` flag, `/chrome` command, navigation, clicking, typing, form filling, console log reading, authenticated web apps, GIF recording, multi-site workflows.

source.title: CLI reference - Claude Code Docs
source.description: CLI commands and flags reference: `claude`, `claude -p`, `claude -c`, `--model`, `--agent`, `--agents` JSON format, `--allowedTools`, `--mcp-config`, `--system-prompt`, `--append-system-prompt`, `--output-format`, `--permission-mode`, session management, and debugging options.

source.title: Common workflows - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Codebase exploration, bug fixing, refactoring, subagents via `/agents`, Plan Mode (`--permission-mode plan`), test creation, PR generation, image analysis, `ultrathink` extended thinking, session resumption, Git worktrees, Unix piping, custom slash commands.

source.title: Discover and install prebuilt plugins through marketplaces - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Plugin discovery and installation from marketplaces: `/plugin install`, `/plugin marketplace add`, official Anthropic marketplace, LSP code intelligence plugins (`pyright-lsp`, `typescript-lsp`), MCP integrations, development workflow plugins, installation scopes, auto-updates, and troubleshooting.

source.title: Claude Code GitHub Actions - Claude Code Docs
source.description: GitHub Actions integration: `@claude` mentions, PR/issue automation, `/install-github-app` setup, `claude-code-action@v1`, `claude_args`, slash commands, `CLAUDE.md` configuration, AWS Bedrock and Google Vertex AI OIDC authentication, custom GitHub Apps, and workflow triggers.

source.title: Claude Code GitLab CI/CD - Claude Code Docs
source.description: GitLab CI/CD integration: `.gitlab-ci.yml` job configuration, `@claude` mention triggers, `AI_FLOW_*` variables, MR automation, AWS Bedrock OIDC and Google Vertex AI WIF authentication, `mcp__gitlab` tooling, `CLAUDE.md` standards, and security best practices.

source.title: Hooks reference - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Hook reference: 10 events (`PreToolUse`, `PostToolUse`, `PermissionRequest`, `Stop`, `SubagentStop`, `SessionStart`, `SessionEnd`, `UserPromptSubmit`, `Notification`, `PreCompact`), JSON input/output schemas, `decision`/`reason` control, `type: prompt` LLM hooks, MCP tool matchers, `CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR` environment variable.

source.title: Connect Claude Code to tools via MCP - Claude Code Docs
source.description: MCP server configuration: `claude mcp add` with `--transport` (http, sse, stdio), `--scope` (local, project, user), `--env` variables, `.mcp.json` files, OAuth `/mcp` authentication, `@server:resource` mentions, `/mcp__server__prompt` commands, `managed-mcp.json` enterprise controls.

source.title: Optimize your terminal setup - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Terminal optimisation: `/config` theme matching, `/terminal-setup` for Shift+Enter, Option+Enter with Meta key, iTerm2 `Silence bell` notifications, `/vim` mode keybindings (`hjkl`, `dw`, `cw`), handling large paste inputs, `/statusline` customisation.
